step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped loosely in your lap, maintaining a relaxed posture.
You're raising your hands well. Try to keep your elbows a bit closer together as you bring them towards your forehead.
Excellent! You've successfully spread your elbows wide behind your head. Keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Good hold. Remember to breathe deeply while maintaining the stretch for the full 30 seconds.
Nicely done reversing the motion. Ensure your hands return smoothly to your lap.
Second rep starting well. Continue to keep your hands clasped comfortably in your lap.
Good movement towards the forehead. Focus on keeping those elbows relatively close as you lift.
Great job spreading your elbows wide behind your head again. Maintain that upright head position.
Holding steady. Remember the tip to keep your head upright and avoid any forward pull.
Excellent return to the starting position. You completed the exercise smoothly.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Focus on keeping your elbows close when raising hands and spreading them wide behind your head. Remember to maintain an upright head position throughout.
